name: SD Gundam Generation: Gryps Senki
overview: SD Gundam Generation: Gryps Senki ("SD Gundam Generation: Record of Gryps War") is a turn-based strategy game for the Super Famicom. It is based on the Gryps Conflict arc of Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam. It is the second of six SD Gundam Generation games released for the Sufami Turbo peripheral, which uses smaller carts that are able to communicate with each other when placed in the Sufami Turbo device.
